animeTitle: Invasion of the Immortal Emperor Season 2
otherNames: Xiandi Ruqin, Invasion of the Immortal Emperor, La Invasión del Emperador Inmortal, Xiāndì Rùqīn, 仙帝入侵, 陰キャの俺が修仙世界でウハモテ逆襲した件, 환생무림기
synopsis: The miserable and ugly man, reborn into a sect full of beautiful sisters! He thought he’d spend his whole life with them, but he was faced by countless mountains, bloody battles, rainy winds… The rubbish Tian Chen in the eyes of others, the abandoned son of a martial family, destined to be a good for nothing for a lifetime! in order to prove himself, and get back what he lost, and protect his loved ones, he embarked on a road full of hurdles, stars move and fight, everything is unified, a generation of the best immortal emperor finally arrives, he stands on the top of the continent, trying to become the most dazzling existence in tens of thousands of years!
